alert.note: Alert for Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 10:23AM EST until December 20 at 2:48AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wappingers Creek at Wappingers Falls. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor flooding and water begins to flood nearby homes. At 10.0 feet, Moderate flood stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Wappingers Creek Wappingers Falls Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Tue 9 am: 8.9 Forecast: Tue 1 pm 9.1 Tue 7 pm 8.3 Wed 1 am 7.3 Wed 7 am 6.7 Wed 1 pm 6.2 Wed 7 pm 5.9 Thu 1 am 5.7 Thu 7 am 5.5 Thu 1 pm 5.4 Thu 7 pm 5.3 &&
